subject: PE Today: It's Not The Size...
body:
CBSNews.com












Long 
      Story ShortOK, pop quiz, kids: Does this sound like an 
      excerpt from a CBSNews.com story – or a snippet from a spam email? 
…many normal men suffer "small-penis syndrome," urologists 
        report.If you guessed "CBSNews.com story," congratulations – 
      gold star! [+ Read More]

Dealing 
      With "Death"As for the notion that the nickname "Dr. Death" is pejorative, that's up for 
      debate. I tend to think of "death" as a pretty neutral term, lacking a 
      value judgment – unlike, say, "murder." I also suspect that Kevorkian, who 
      went out of his way to publicize the notion of doctor assisted suicide, 
      might not have such a problem with the nickname.[+ Read More]

We'll Always 
      Have Paris ... But Why?Alright, now to the elephant in the 
      room. Or, more accurately, to the stick figure in the jail cell: Paris 
      Hilton. [+ Read More]
